T02D3405:70b-1: a'arya sha ta ksha r'i ma h'a bidy'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3405:70b-3: 'phags pa yi ge drug ma rig pa chen po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3405:70b-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3405:70b-5: dang por re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3405:70b-6: kha bsang ba la sogs pa byas nas rang gi
T02D3405:70b-7: snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i hr'i:yig dkar po
T02D3405:70b-8: las 'od zer 'phros nas bla ma dang /
T02D3405:70b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du bltas te yang
T02D3405:70b-11: dag par mchod nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba
T02D3405:70b-12: la sogs pa bya ba ni /
T02D3405:70b-13: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3405:70b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji srid sems can rnams dang /
T02D3405:70b-15: sems can gyi khongs su gtogs shing bsdus pa rnams /
T02D3405:70b-16: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
T02D3405:70b-18: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
T02D3405:70b-24: 'du shes yod min med min dang /
T02D3405:70b-25: gang yang cung zad sems can gyi khongs su gtogs
T02D3405:70b-26: shing bgrang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis phung
T02D3405:70b-27: po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D3405:70b-29: de nas aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D3405:70b-30: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D3405:70b-31: de'i rjes su skad cig gis stong par dmigs shing /
T02D3405:70b-32: de nas rang gi snying bar padma dkar po'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3405:70b-33: de'i steng du hr'i:yig dkar po /
T02D3405:70b-34: de la 'od zer brgya stong dpag tu med pa byung bar bsams la /
T02D3405:70b-35: sems can thams cad kyi dus thog ma med pa
T02D3405:70b-36: nas bsags pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs
T02D3405:70b-37: pa'i tshogs ma lus pa rnam par dag par byas
T02D3405:70b-38: nas / slar yang de nyid la de bzhin du
T02D3405:70b-39: zhugs nas gang de nyid yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3405:70b-40: bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku /
T02D3405:70b-41: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3405:70b-42: sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa g-yon padma bsnams pa /
T02D3405:70b-43: g-yas na bgrang phreng bsnams pa /
T02D3405:70b-44: phyag gzhan gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
T02D3405:71a-0: 'od dpag med kyi ral pa'i cod pan can bsgom @71a * //
T02D3405:71a-2: g-yas phyogs su nor bu 'dzin pa de dang sku
T02D3405:71a-3: mdog phyag mtshan mtshungs pa padma'i nang gi steng du
T02D3405:71a-4: gnas pa'o // de bzhin du g-yon du padma gzhan
T02D3405:71a-5: gyi steng du yi ge drug ma'i rig byed ma
T02D3405:71a-6: chen mo 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba'i sku
T02D3405:71a-7: mdog dang phyag mtshan bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3405:71a-8: de nas aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva dza:h'um bam ho:su ra ta stvam /
T02D3405:71a-9: aa la la la la ho /
T02D3405:71a-10: aa:aa:aa:a'a:zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya'o //
T02D3405:71a-11: de bzhin du bsgoms nas de nas 'jig rten dbang
T02D3405:71a-12: phyug gi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
T02D3405:71a-13: pa la bgrang phreng gi rnam pa lta bu kha
T02D3405:71a-14: dog dkar po zhal nas phyung ste /
T02D3405:71a-15: lte bar 'jug cing 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba'i sbyor bas /
T02D3405:71a-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po rtog pa'i sngags
T02D3405:71a-17: kyi rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di mtshan
T02D3405:71a-18: ma med pa'i sbyor bas blta zhing de nas bzlas
T02D3405:71a-19: pa bya'o // de nas 'khor zhing 'dzag pa la sogs pa thob nas dad pa dang /
T02D3405:71a-20: snying rje dang ldan zhing bla ma la gus pa'i
T02D3405:71a-21: rnal 'byor pas dus mi ring bas dngos grub tu
T02D3405:71a-22: 'gyur ro // aom ma ni padme h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3405:71a-23: de nas ldang ba'i dus su sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02D3405:71a-24: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D3405:71a-26: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D3405:71a-27: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D3405:71a-28: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D3405:71a-29: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3405:71a-34: bha ga w'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a
T02D3405:71a-35: me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya
T02D3405:71a-36: satva a'a:zhes brjod nas ci bder gnas par bya'o ;
T02D3405:71a-37: / yi ge drug ma'i sgrub thabs /
